long_description: The men's Simple Guide Pants from Patagonia are lightweight, stretch-woven alpine pants with great breathability and a fast dry time. Stretch-woven soft-shell fabric wicks moisture, breathes, dries quickly and is weather- and abrasion-resistant; Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light precip. Partially elasticized waistband with a zippered fly, button closure and belt loops. Articulated knees for full mobility. 2 hand pockets, cargo pocket and rear pocket have smooth, reverse-coil zippers and resist moisture. The Patagonia Simple Guide Pants have a slim-fitting cut and may be worn over base layers and light mid layers.
short_description: The men's Simple Guide Pants from Patagonia are lightweight, stretch-woven alpine pants with great breathability and a fast dry time.
